# Validate numeric range
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Validates if a number is within a specified range.


## Parameter

### Min

Minimum allowed number

- ID: `min`
- Datatype: `double`
- Default Value: `None`



### Max

Maximum allowed number

- ID: `max`
- Datatype: `double`
- Default Value: `None`
